text: BASIC T/O Txns read and write objects without locks. Every object X is tagged with timestamp of the last txn that successfully did read/write: — W-TS(X) - Write timestamp on X — R-TS(X) - Read timestamp on X Check timestamps for every operationé — If txn tries to access an object "from the fu i and restarts. 1 19 9:13/1:20:37 - TODAY'S AGENDA > [cc & ( \I_;] e CMU Database Systems - 18 Timestamp Ordering Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
